entries.title: Joe's Adventure
entries.author: Jack Johnson
entries.description: This game is about a boy named Joe who lost his bike, so he takes an attempt to fetch it back from the person who stole it from him, first having to find out who it is. He navigates through thousands of obstances, hopping from one world to another, visitng 7 different worlds. He finally meets the guys who stole is bike and hopes to take it back.
